Author: big_hoop_attitude
Text: Thank you! I can't safely start until January 1-15 because of an injury, but I'm so excited to just to look at it and I know the weight loss is just a few steps away.   Now to get through the rest of the holiday season without eating too fucking much!

Author: backatmybsagain
Text: I have one! I'm a stay at home mom and my kids are really young so gyms aren't really an option for me. It's really nice to be able to get a run in while they nap. I don't do it as often as I should but it's really comforting to know that it's there. I'm excited and happy for you!
